alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Muscogee; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Muscogee, northeastern Chattahoochee, southwestern Talbot and southeastern Harris Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Eelbeck/West Fort Benning, or 7 miles north of Cusseta, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Fort Benning, Upatoi, Flat Rock, Box Springs, Midland, Kenwood, Sand Hill, Eelbeck/West Fort Benning and Vista Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for west central Georgia.
